title: Detecting Malwares with LGBM
description: Microsoft Malware detectionIn this kernel, I build a LGBM model using only a subset of the training data, in order to fit in memory. Notebook  Content Utility functions Loading the data   2.1 Get the files and select the variables   2.2 Define the type of each variable Feature engineering   3.1 Frequency encoding   3.2 Label encoding Training the model Feature importance Submission
